attributes.action: To label meat sold in the UK clearly about how it was slaughtered.
attributes.additional_details:
I want the government to take action to legislate clear signs instead of coded numbers. 
Halal meat is sold in all major supermarkets including Waitrose and Sainsbury's. Not to mention in most schools too. Even meat that has a Union Jack label on it can be slaughtered the halal way.
Clear labelling is the only way to stop cruelty to animals.
attributes.background:
Meat in the UK is being sold discreetly without proper labeled to how it was slaughtered. 
Halal meat is sold to many schools. By supermarkets such as Waitrose and Sainsbury's unknowingly to most people because it is not clearly maked up. Only a number code to denote this fact.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions, which ask for similar actions:

"Label ALL meat as Religiously Slaughtered or Non-Religiously Slaughtered" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/740004

"Require non-stunned and stunned meat to be labelled accordingly" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/737327
